Plot: When a serial killer interrupts the fun at the swanky Coconut Pete's Coconut Beach Resort--a hedonistic island paradise for swingers--it's up to the club's staff to stop the violence...or at least hide it.
Title: Club Dread
Writer: Jay Chandrasekhar, Kevin Heffernan, Steve Lemme, Paul Soter, Erik Stolhanske
Actors: Elena Lyons, Dan Montgomery Jr., Tanja Reichert, Nat Faxon
tomatoConsensus: Comedy is too hit-or-miss is this slasher spoof.
